cast.overview: The story revolves around a retired judge, Mr. Sen, living in a farmhouse on the outskirts of the city. The people who stay in the colony are a handful of social outcasts. One day, the judge is found dead under mysterious circumstances, and Byomkesh takes up the case.
cast.title: Byomkesh O Chiriakhana

cast.overview: Abhi (Jeet) confronts Kali Prasad and his son Durga Prasad (Rajesh Sharma). Then?
cast.title: Aakrosh

cast.overview: Arnab's life turns upside after the authorities press false charges against him and send him to jail. When his wife is killed, he sets out to exact revenge against the culprits who destroyed his life.
cast.title: Villain

cast.overview: Rajesh, a policeman, kills Bimal, assuming he is Saheb, a goon. As a result, Seema, Bimal's beautiful widow, is forced into an unfortunate life in a brothel. Later, Rajesh learns that Saheb is still alive.
cast.title: Shikar

cast.overview: Hemanta, a student of filmmaking in New York, returns to Kolkata before his mother is going to marry his uncle after his father's suicide. He receives a series of untraceable texts in riddles arising suspicion on the true nature of his father's death. He starts to lose his conscious self and plans on taking revenge upon the killers.
cast.title: Hemanta

cast.overview: Aagun Pakhi is a Bengali drama film, directed by Shubhrajit Mitra, under the banner of Mindscapes Maestros. The film depicts how people suffer in the society to make a change in it. It also shows how people become weak if they fight against the politician or the corrupt system.
cast.title: Aagun Pakhi

cast.overview: Estranged sweethearts naive Nawbab and not hot enough Nanndini, who were separated during childhood, reunite at a  college and fall in love. Will Nanndini's father and her suitor approve of their courtship?
cast.title: Nabab Nandini

cast.overview: A ne'er-do-well must man up to confront his brother's tormentors, and wise up in order to fight for the love of the right woman.
cast.title: Champion

cast.overview: Eken Babu arrives in Benaras with Bapi and Pramatha and soon finds himself entangled in a perplexing mystery. Strange coded messages lead him to a sinister conspiracy threatening the Masaan Holi festival. Racing against time, he must outsmart shadowy figures to save the sacred city from chaos.
cast.title: The Eken: Benaras e Bibhishika

cast.overview: An adventurous romantic comedy in which Bonny is opposite Ayoshi and Soham opposite Koushani.
cast.title: Hirokgorer Hire
